text: @BetsyDeVosED In my #schooldistrict we have 1727 confirmed #COVID19 cases. Without universal, ongoing testing we put students and teachers at-risk. Why won't you help us mitigate the spread and invest new $ in distance learning @BetsyDeVosED !? #Education #reopeningschools #COVID19 https://t.co/mA5IpoyL1q
